12 Read the passage and answer the questions
FUTURE ME
My name is Jack and I am 12 years old. When I grow up, I want to be an astronaut. First, I think I will like being an astonaut. Because I’m very interested in space. Second, I like investigating about planets and new discoveries. My friends make fun of me everytime I start talking about the phases of moon. But I don’t mind. Science lessons are my favorite. I like having experiments with my teachers. I’m not a fan of plants or flowers. But studying hard to encyclopedias are my thing. I want to learn more about outer space, moon and the galaxy.
Scientists study the galaxy too. But I want to explore the life out of Earth, go beyond boundaries and inspire other people.
Answer TRUE or FALSE.
1 Jack is twelve years old.
2 He wants to become a scientist.
3 He likes investigating about plants.
4 His friends like and support his future ideas.
5 His aim is to find life in other countries.
